description:
"EuroPython 2021: Help us build the next edition!
EuroPython 2020 - EuroPython session - 2020-07-24 - Ni
Online

By Marc-Andre Lemburg

We need help with organizing and running EuroPython 2021.

In this session, we will explain how the EuroPython workgroup model works and where you could help.

title: Marc-Andre Lemburg - EuroPython 2021: Help us build the next edition!
